response.overview: In the first part of this spell-binding feature conceptualized by Daisy Taylor, we meet the mysterious and adorable Rebecca (Ella Hollywood) a girl making a fresh start at Notre-Ange-de-Bois University. However, she soon realizes that this new class might not be as clean of a slate as she thinks it is. A woman from Rebecca's past has followed her to this new town and is willing to do whatever it takes to make Rebecca's life an absolute horror show.
response.title: Bitch Craft
